newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Emmis Broadcasting rating up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Emmis Broadcasting rating up.

text.p: -- Gruntal & Co said it raised its rating on Emmis Broadcasting Corp to outperform from neutral due solely to price. The target price for the stock remains $47 a share. Emmis shares were up 2-7/8 at 43-3/4.

-- Earlier, Emmis reported second quarter earnings of $0.53 a share, up from $0.38 a year ago, and above Gruntal's estimate of $0.49 a share. The high estimate among the range of other analysts' estimates was $0.50.
-- "Results marked the eleventh consecutive quarter of increased broadcast cash flow, increasing 5.3 percent to $15.9 million," Gruntal said in a report.
-- Gruntal added Emmis is expected to post revenue gains of four percent to $103.8 million and cash flow gains of seven percent to $34.0 million in 1997.

-- It added Emmis shares have declined 22 percent during the past three weeks, after trading at a 52-week high of 52-1/2. Gruntal said it believes Emmis shares are fairly valued at $47 a share and that the recent price decline has created a buying opportunity.
